---
title: "County Health Open Source Project"
---

Welcome to the **County Health Open Source Project**, a community-driven effort to preserve, update, and extend the **County Health Rankings & Roadmaps** data after the loss of program funding.

Our mission is to:

-   Keep 15+ years of county health data accessible
-   Enable anyone with interest or expertise to contribute new calculations
-   Support transparent, open methods
-   Provide user-friendly ways to explore county-level health data

## Resources

-   **Snapshot App:**\
    Explore county-level health using an interactive interface.\
    → <https://hannaheow.shinyapps.io/snapshot/>

-   **Data Calculations:**\
    Scripts and workflows to compute county-level measures of health.\
    → <https://github.com/County-Health-Rankings-and-Roadmaps/county_health_measure_calculations>

-   **countyhealthR package:**\
    Seamlessly interact with county-level data in R.\
    → LINK TO CRAN ONCE ITS PUBLISHED

-   **Historical Data Archive (Zenodo):**\
    An archive of 15 years of County Health Rankings & Roadmaps data releases.\
    → <https://zenodo.org/communities/countyhealthrankingsandroadmaps/records?q=&l=list&p=1&s=10&sort=newest>

-   **Archived Documentation Site:**\
    Historical documentation, methods, and notes.\
    → ARCHIVE_OF_ADMIN_SITE_HERE

-   **Check our all of the ways CHR&R data has been used in the past!** \
    Real-time updates of peer-reviewed publications citing CHR&R.\
    → A FUN PLAYTHING FOR ME :) (in progress)

If you'd like to help, please check out the [**How to Contribute**](https://county-health-rankings-and-roadmaps.github.io/welcome/contribute.html) guide, explore the open issues in our [**measure calculations repository**](https://github.com/County-Health-Rankings-and-Roadmaps/county_health_measure_calculations/issues), file a bug report to improve the snapshot app via the [snapshot Issues page](https://github.com/County-Health-Rankings-and-Roadmaps/countyhealthR/issues), or share ways that you're using CHR&R data in our [**Discussion Forum**](https://github.com/orgs/County-Health-Rankings-and-Roadmaps/discussions).

Let's keep this important public data alive together!
